diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $12$ units.
The measure of angle $BAD$ is $x$ degrees.
The length of the line $AD$ is $12$ units.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $AD$.
line_instances: The line $AB$ and $AD$ intersect at point $A$.
The line $AB$ and $BD$ intersect at point $B$.
The line $AC$ and $AD$ intersect at point $D$.
The line $BC$ and $BD$ intersect at point $C$.
